content.question: The words Vereor . . . cogere (lines 11-12) are best translated

choices.label: I am afraid to see someone who not only asks, but compels
I am not afraid to be seen, nor to ask, nor to force
I fear that someone may see him ask or show force
I fear that I may seem not to ask, but to compel

content.answer: I fear that I may seem not to ask, but to compel
